profile_summary:
As a Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in **Python**, **Machine Learning**, and **MLOps**, utilizing an extensive tech stack that includes **NumPy**, **Pandas**, **Scikit-Learn**, **PyTorch**, **Transformers**, **LangChain**, and **Streamlit**. My background enables me to build and deploy sophisticated models, particularly leveraging large language models and statistical modeling techniques to drive innovation across healthcare and financial sectors.
I possess profound knowledge of cloud platforms, specifically **AWS** and **Azure**, incorporating services like **SageMaker**, **Lambda**, **Fargate**, and **Glue** to optimize and scale machine learning workflows. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in **CI/CD** practices, employing tools such as **MLflow** and **GitHub Actions** for seamless application lifecycle management.
My strengths lie in developing enterprise-grade platforms enriched with AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. Moreover, I am adept at real-time data processing and have experience adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring that all solutions are robust and secure.
